subject: Tunnel boring machine maintenance scheduled
body: TBM requires scheduled maintenance downtime from Nov 10-12. This will pause excavation for Section B-3. Schedule impact: 2 days delay.

subject: Safety protocol violation - improper venting
body: Inspector noted improper ventilation setup in tunnel section. Immediate correction required before work can resume. Safety meeting scheduled for tomorrow.

subject: Reinforcing steel delivery confirmed
body: All reinforcing steel for Section B-4 tunnel lining delivered and staged. Ready for placement starting Monday morning.

subject: Utility relocation conflict detected
body: Existing 12-inch water main conflicts with planned tunnel alignment. Coordination meeting with city utilities department required.

subject: Soil stability report - Section B-5
body: Geotechnical analysis complete. Soil conditions suitable for planned excavation. Report uploaded to project portal.

subject: Weekly progress - Section B ahead of schedule
body: Section B progress: 72% complete, 5 days ahead of schedule. Tunneling operations running smoothly. Next milestone: Section B-6 breakthrough expected next week.
